description.description1: The Grovemade Desk Shelf provides an ergonomic lift and ample space for up to two screens. It’s designed to last a lifetime and is suited to almost any modern work configuration, providing subtle organization for your space. We crafted it from 15-ply premium hardwood plywood, aluminum and natural cork hand stained with Japanese calligraphy ink.
description.description2: We designed an integrated shelf, for storing books, trays, notebooks—any of your work tools that you need close at hand. The shelf has a curved back to prevent things from falling off.
description.description3: Each desk shelf is made by hand and finished to perfection.
description.description4: The desk shelf is designed to support multiple devices and configurations. See the measurements below to make sure it will work for your home office.
description.description5: Designed by Grovemade in Portland, OR  Manufactured with vendor partners in Portland, OR and Milwaukee, WI
description.description6: Natural Cork / Ebonized Cork with Sumi ink American Walnut / Eastern Hardrock Maple Plywood (15-ply) American Solid Walnut / Eastern Hardrock Maple Matte Black / Matte White Powder Coated Medium Density Fiberboard 5052 Aluminum
description.description7: Top Surface - 46 inch wide x 9inch deep Height to top surface - 4.5” Small compartment - 13.25” wide x 8.5” deep x 1.625inch tall Large compartment - 24.5” wide x 8.5inch deep x 1.625 inch tall Weight - 12 lbsMonitors in photo are 25” screens (diagonal). Works with almost all monitors, including 27” Apple displays.
description.description8: Hand sanded and finished with vegetable-based oil Compatible with all monitor Supports up to 50 lbs, or 100 lbs distributed evenly Improved ergonomics Reversible for left or right-handed use
description.description9: This product is made from natural materials, and you can expect a variation in color and wood grain Simple, less than one minute assembly required, no tools needed

description.description1: The Grovemade Laptop Stand brings clarity and comfort to your workspace. It features an angled, stable platform for improved ergonomics, a stainless steel stop lined with premium vegetable tanned leather to hold your laptop, and room below for stowing your accessories.Walnut Wood Grovemade Desk Collection with walnut laptop stand, pen cups, desk lamps, planter, leather mouse pad, leather wrist pad, and keyboard tray.
description.description5: Design, die cutting, and final machining by Grovemade in Portland, OR Manufactured with vendor partners in Portland, OR and Waynesboro, MS
description.description6: American Black Walnut / Eastern Hardrock Maple Plywood (7-ply) Stainless Steel Stop Domestic Vegetable-Tanned Leather Natural Cork Feet
description.description7: A small but stable footprint anchors the laptop riser in your work area, freeing desk space both around and beneath your laptop.
description.description8: Front Base Width: 18 inch Rear Base Width: 20.5 inch Front Height: 3.25 Rear-Height: 6 inch Depth: 11.5 inch Laptop Surface: 15 ich x 8.5 inch Steel Stop Width: 11 inch hickness: 0.5
description.description9: Hand sanded and finished with vegetable-based oil Compatible with all laptops Supports up to 200 pounds Leather lining on metal stop protects from scratches Improved ergonomics
description.description10: This product uses authentic full grain leather which has beautiful imperfections from its natural origins. It will develop a distinguished character with use.

title.title2: Give your laptop (and your productivity) a boost

description.description1: Our laptop riser lifts your screen extra high for ideal ergonomics, combined with a small, stable footprint that fits into the tight spaces at your desk. Integrated cord management keeps things tidy and merino wool felt protects and cushions your device.
description.description2: We designed a simple and effective cord management system into the laptop riser to hold your power cord in place. It's right there when you need it, and won't whip onto the floor when you're done.
description.description3: A small but stable footprint anchors the laptop riser in your work area, freeing desk space both around and beneath your laptop.

title.title1: A Place For All Your Tools

description.description1: Our Desk Tray organizes your essential items for quick and easy access. Machined from solid cork, it provides a soft and protective bed for your tools, with four pockets designed to accommodate the things you need most at your desk. We hand dye the cork with Japanese calligraphy ink.
description.description2: When paired with the Grovemade Desk Shelf and Desk Pad, the Desk Tray gives you the storage and organization you need without taking up precious desk space. Slide it out when you need to sketch or take a note, and slide it right back in to get your tools out of sight. A natural cork base protects your desk.
description.description3: Each desk tray is machined from solid cork and finished by hand.
description.description5: Designed by Grovemade in Portland, OR Manufactured with vendor partners in Portland, OR and Milwaukee, WI
description.description6: Sized to fit Desk Shelves purchased after 10/25/2021
description.description7: 1.5” tall x 13” wide x 8.75” deep Pencil Pocket - 8 “ wide x 1 ⅝” long , 3 pencil grooves each 7 ¾” long Small Pocket - 3.25” wide x 1.5” long Medium Pocket - 3.25” wide x 4.5” long Large Pocket - 7.75” wide x 4.5” long Pencil Pocket is 7/16” deep All other pockets are ¾” deep
description.description8: 5052 Aluminum Natural CorkSumi Ink (Dark version only)

description.description1: The leather desk pad brings visual structure and organization to your workspace. The premium, vegetable-tanned leather is soft and smooth, and it will develop a distinguished patina over time.
description.description2: More than just a slab of leather, the Grovemade Leather Desk Pad is laminated in house to a natural cork backing. It’s then die cut for a clean, modern look. The excellent hand-feel and function of leather made even more functional to give you a desk mat that really elevates.
description.description3: Our desk pads come in five sizes to give you the flexibility you need. Small, medium & medium plus provide room for your external keyboard and mouse. All three coordinate with the Grovemade Desk Shelf and work with any size desk.
description.description5: Design & manufacturing by Grovemade in Portland, OR
description.description6: Wickett & Craig Premium Vegetable-Tanned American Leather Natural cork
description.description7: 3.5 mm thick  - 11” x 24.75” Medium - 11.5” x 38” Medium Plus - 15.75  x 38 Large - 26” x 38.5”  Extra Large - 26.5 x 49
description.description8: Works with optical mice Works as a writing surface
description.description10: This product uses authentic full grain leather which has beautiful imperfections from its natural origins. It will develop a distinguished character with use.

new.title: Designing the Desk Shelf System - Part One
new.content: It had been four years since we’d launched our original desk collection. It was time to take the next step and add to the collection.

new.title: Meet Jade and Chris Towery
new.content: From Korea and Ventura to RISD, and back to Venice Beach. A crafted life filled with design.

new.title: Designing The Minimalist Wallet
new.content: The Grovemade Minimalist Wallet, part of the Every Day Carry (EDC) collection, was designed for simplicity and ease of use...

new.title: Designing The Desk Collection
new.content: The spark came in 2013, when Ken and Joe made a trip to San Francisco and toured the newly finished headquarters of lodging-service giant Airbnb...

new.title: Making the Desk Tray
new.content: Our desk tray is designed to work seamlessly with our desk shelf system. Come behind the scenes in our workshop to see how each tray is made. Natural cork with machined pockets for just the stuff that you need.

new.title: A Place For Everything
new.content: We've looked at hundreds of customers desks, and we're constantly intrigued and curious to see all the ways the desk shelf system is implemented around the world.
